Definition: C.31 - EHDS refined base model for Coverage
The type of coverage: social program, medical plan, accident coverage (workers compensation, auto), group health or payment by an individual or organization.
Patient who benefits from the insurance coverage when products and/or services are provided.
Payor including both insurance and non-insurance agreements, such as patient-pay agreements.
Number or code under which the insured person is registered at the insurance provider.
